text: Roy Horan III (January 1, 1950 – October 12, 2021) was an American actor and martial artist. Horan was best known as Lewis in 1981 martial arts movie Game of Death II, and Priest/Russian in 1978 martial arts movie Snake in the Eagle's Shadow. Horan was born in Laurel, Maryland, and died in Los Angeles, California on October 12, 2021, at the age of 71.Roy Horan, Star of ‘Game of Death II’ and Father of Actor Celina Jade, Dead at 71 ==References== Category:1950 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American television actors Category:American voice actors Category:American martial artists Category:Actors from Maryland Category:People from Laurel, Maryland
title: Roy Horan
